trans-unit.source: Provides information about installed plug-in serializers.
Plug-in serializer classes derive from and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> interface.
Gets the name of the assembly that contains the serializer.
The name of the assembly (usually a DLL) that contains the plug-in serializer.
Gets the path to the assembly file that contains the serializer.
The path to the assembly file that contains the plug-in serializer.
Gets the version of the assembly that contains the serializer.
The version of the assembly that contains the plug-in serializer.

Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> through a given <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> implementation.
Only full trust callers can use this method.
The source of data for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref>.

A new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> with its properties initialized with values from the given <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> implementation.
factoryInstance is null.
One or more of the following properties of the factoryInstance is null: , , , and
Gets the default extension associated with files that the serializer outputs.
The default extension associated with files that the serializer outputs.
Gets the public display name of the serializer.
The public display name of the serializer.
Tests two <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> objects for equality.

Equals returns `true` even if the two objects differ in one or more of the following properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerWebsite%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A>.
The object to be compared with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> derived class that implements the serializer.
The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> derived class that implements the serializer.
Gets the unique hash code value of the serializer.

The unique hash code value is created based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.FactoryInterfaceName%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> properties of the serializer.
The unique hash code value of the serializer.
Gets a value indicating whether the serializer can be loaded with the currently installed version of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)].

IsLoadable should be **false** unless <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> has the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the serializer assembly can be loaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the name of the company that developed the serializer.
Plug-in serializer classes derive from and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> interface.
The name of the company that developed the plug-in serializer.
Gets the web address of the company that developed the serializer.
The web address of the company that developed the serializer.
Gets the version of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] required by the serializer.
WinFXVersion must have the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> or the serializer assembly cannot be loaded.
The version of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] required by the plug-in serializer.
